about_the_game:
Dildo Catcher is a fascinating and colorful video game starring the charming Sofia. Her greatest passion is big dildos, which she is always eager to catch with her pussy and use to achieve incredible sensations.

In this game, Sofia's main goal is to catch the dildos that unpredictably appear on the screen. The game wonderfully combines fast action and strategy elements. After all, you have to be not only quick to grab the dildos, but also skillful so that these dildos don't fall to the floor, otherwise the game will be over. Dildo Catcher is more than just a game, it's an emotional journey, allowing players to experience the world through the eyes of the inimitable Sophia. Experience the full range of sensations that these fun and original sex toys have to offer, and appreciate unique moments of joy and satisfaction with Sophia. Thrilling gameplay, dynamic music and gorgeous graphics provide an unforgettable experience.

What awaits you in the game:
Sexy girl Sophia
Realistic graphics
Stunning music

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (only 64-bit) or Windows 10 (only 64-bit)
  • Processor: 3.0 Ghz (2 Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 260 / Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (only 64-bit) or Windows 10 (only 64-bit)
  • Processor: 3.33 Ghz (4 Core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 670 / AMD Radeon HD 7990
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
